plot: Hurricane Hugo: The Longest Night is a collection of heartbreaking intimate stories of those who endured Hurricane Hugo's wrath in the U.S. Virgin Islands, a storm so powerful and unforgiving, it spanned two days.
title: Hurricane Hugo: The Longest Night
plot_es: Hurricane Hugo: The Longest Night is a collection of heartbreaking intimate stories of those who endured Hurricane Hugo's wrath in the U.S. Virgin Islands, a storm so powerful and unforgiving, it spanned two days.
plot_en: Hurricane Hugo: The Longest Night is a collection of heartbreaking intimate stories of those who endured Hurricane Hugo's wrath in the U.S. Virgin Islands, a storm so powerful and unforgiving, it spanned two days.
